item.title: Version 1.3 (Build 46) - Fully Notarized by Apple
item.description:
Build 46 - Fully Notarized by Apple

  • Fully Notarized by Apple - No security warnings
  • Code Signed with Developer ID - Verified and secure
  • Fixed Update Error - Resolved installer launch issues
  • Clean Extended Attributes - No resource fork issues
  • Native macOS Sharing - Share Clnbrd with friends
  • Share Button in Menu Bar - Easy access to sharing
  • Share Button in Settings - Additional sharing option
  • Professional Share Content - Beautiful, engaging copy
  • ⌘⌥V Hotkey - Paste cleaned text instantly
  • Auto-clean on Copy - Automatically strip formatting
  • Menu Bar Integration - Quick access from your Mac
  • Format Removal - Strips all formatting, styles, and metadata
  • Performance Monitoring - Built-in memory and CPU optimization
  • Error Recovery - Automatic recovery from clipboard issues
  • Privacy-focused Analytics - Track usage patterns
  • Auto-updates - Seamless future updates

This is a fully notarized release approved by Apple's security team.
